title: Two Months Free! 3 Bedroom Brand New Apartment Building!
posting_body: Rare rental opportunity in the brand new building!
Call to find out about additional rental incentives including free parking!
Copy and Paste the link to view the 3D tour: <URL>
Grocery shopping is made easy with Whole Foods in the same building as your new home!
Fitness centers fully outfitted with cardio and strength training equipment
Walking distance to Union Square and the Westfield Mall
Located across the street from the Heart of The City Farmer’s Market, open every Sunday and Wednesday, supporting 55 local farmers
Less than 1 mile from the Soma StrEat Food Park featuring food trucks and rotating vendors every week
Trinity was founded in 1949 with a singular purpose—to become The City’s premier apartment provider.
Seven decades later, Trinity stands “best-in-class” with buildings that offer the best locations, prices, and amenities.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
